author: A D Balasubramaniyan
text:
Palanisamy, a secondary grade teacher attached to Panchayat Union Middle School in Koottaiyur village, has been suspended on charges of misbehaving with girl students in the school.

People of the village were angered by the news. They converged in front of the school to stage a protest.

As the teacher hadnot turned out to the school they demanded his presence.

Meanwhile the education authorities conducted an enquiry and the District Elementary Education Officer Rajendran suspended Palanisamy.
title: School teacher suspended for misbehaving with girls
